records.name: Como Cocoa Island

descriptions.direction: Located in Makunufushi, COMO Cocoa Island is on the beach. Maldives Islamic Centre and Mulee Aage Palace are local landmarks, and the area's natural beauty can be seen at Paradise Island Beach and Kandooma Beach. Take an opportunity to explore the area for water adventures such as fishing.
descriptions.general: General description: The hotel COMO Cocoa Island is located in the vicinity of its own sandy beach. At the beach, there are sun umbrellas and sun loungers free of charge. The airport (MLE) is approx. 29 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee) hourly. Amenities: The one-storey beach hotel has 33 rooms. It is equipped with a 24h reception (check-in from 14:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, an air conditioning, a safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as a money changing facility. For the meals, there is a restaurant. WiFi is available for free. Medical service is free of charge. Room service and laundry / ironing service are available for a fee. For the concierge service the hotel charges a fee (where applicable). Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one pool. Here, there are sun loungers and sun umbrellas for free available. Meals: Breakfast from the buffet. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Fitness. Spa area available for a fee. Sauna, steam bath and massages available (where applicable for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English. Accepted methods of payment: Visa. Dhoni Loft Villa (Speedboat Included): With extra bed, shared pool, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Water Loft Villa (Speedboat Included): With extra bed, shared pool, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 2 Bedroom Villa (Sunrise View, Speedboat Included): With extra bed, shared pool, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Dhoni Villa (Speedboat Included): With extra bed, shared pool, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 1 Bedroom Water Villa (Private Pool - Speedboat): With extra bed, shared pool, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower.

records.short_description: Excellent family hotel. Beautiful beach. Great location.
